title: Digital Recorder Pedagogy Design Utilizing Multimedia

context.prior_knowledge: Basic music theory and recorder-playing experience (beginner level or higher)
context.additional_context: Recorder education software utilizing Malaysian folk songs converted into digital interactive content. Parallel cloud-based access and installable package formats. Provides self-directed learning materials verified by experts.

learning_goals: Students can accurately play five or more Malaysian folk songs on the recorder using digital interaction tools.
Learners can self-diagnose breathing/fingering errors with over 80% accuracy through multimedia feedback systems.
Students can perform self-directed learning three or more times per week by concurrently using cloud-based platforms and offline software.

resources: Malaysian Folk Song Sheet Music and Audio Database

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
